lines.text:
[speaking to the tree]
If I truly love the prince... what about the bear? Dear little tree, tell me where the bear is. Is he a real bear... or is he - the prince?
Any lout can give me pearls like this if he has enough money. I require more from a suitor!
I must have... I must have the singing ringing tree! Bring it to me and then I will listen to you!
I am the ruler of this kingdom into which you foced your way. You are my prisoner!
Me pick berries? I am a princess!
